name: maintenance, lorry 16 metric ton | maintenance, lorry 16 metric ton | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20059/documentation

The dataset represents the maintenance of one lorry 16t.

The activity starts with the consumption of the components and materials for the maintenance.

The dataset ends with the maintenance of one lorry 16t. The dataset includes the consumption of the components and materials for the maintenance, the consumption of lead (battery) and until and including the energy consumption (electricity and light fuel oil).
category: G:Wholesale and retail trade; repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles/45:Wholesale and retail trade and repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles/452:Maintenance and repair of motor vehicles/4520:Maintenance and repair of motor vehicles

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The foundations for the calculations are “Selbstkosten des Gütertransportes” ASTAG (1991) and personal information from a lorry manufacturer (IVECO). The determined data are representative for non-urban use of the vehicles and a yearly traffic performance of 70000 vkm/a (van 30000 km/a). The kilometric performance of the tyres depends on the number of axes and the number of starts and stops. The input value for lead (battery) has been calculated assuming two batteries – with a total weight of 108 kg – per truck. Based on Dietrich (1999) we assume a share of lead, H2SO4 and plastic of 68.2% 25.8% and 6%, respectively. For the energy consumption due to maintenance activities, data from Maibach et al. (1999) have been employed. Is included energy expenditures of heating and lighting of service garages as well as energy expenditures for washing bays.;References:;ASTAG (1991) Die Selbstkosten des Gütertransports mit Nutzfahrzeugen. Schweizer Nutzfahrzeugverband, Bern.;Maibach M., Peter D. and Seiler B. (1999) Ökoinventar Transporte: Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Transportsystemen und den Einbezug von Transportsystemen in Ökobilanzen. Technischer Schlussbericht. In: Schweizerischer Nationalfonds zur Förderung der wissenschaftlichen Forschung (ed. SPP Umwelt M.). 2nd Edition. INFRAS, Zürich
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data extrapolated from the corresponding CH dataset.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data based on expert estimate and further assumption to determine the material consumption.

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
Literature value. Is used 100 g of paper for the oil filter and 1 kg of paper for the air filter. For the determination of maintenance expenditures figures as reported in  Frischknecht et al. (1996) are employed. The foundations for the calculations are “Selbstkosten des Gütertransportes” ASTAG (1991) and personal information from a lorry manufacturer (IVECO). 

Further References:

ASTAG (1991) Die Selbstkosten des Gütertransports mit Nutzfahrzeugen. Schweizer Nutzfahrzeugverband, Bern.
